budget: $2,000-$3,000 for limited scope review + court appearance

rating_system_correction_impact.critical_failure: Sheila-Marie Finkelstein (Klinedinst) rated 89/100 but declined due to large firm policy against limited scope
rating_system_correction_impact.root_cause: Original system awarded points for PAST experience at different firms without verifying CURRENT firm policy
rating_system_correction_impact.v2_correction: Category 2 (Limited Scope) increased to 30 points with mandatory verification gates. Large firms get 0 points until verified.
rating_system_correction_impact.result: 1 candidate disqualified (Sheila-Marie), 4 downgraded (RMO, Citadel, Amity, Kavesh), 2 new high-priority candidates added (David Shapiro, Ravi Patel)
